name: Corona Comfort
description:
Having recovered for last Winter's cold epidemic, the critters were looking forward to a lovely Christmas... unfortunately, the change is season has brought a most unwelcome visitor...

The Hot Water Bottle Fairy's back, with a new look and new wands. It's time to save the critters and end the epidemic - again!

CONTROLS: Tap or left click objects to make stuff happen.

Does the world really need yet another Corona virus game? Probably not. But I learned quite a bit during the development process, even though I'm still a newbie. And if exploding cartoon viruses makes you feel better, then it will have been worth it. :)

The music and sounds don't play properly in the Firefox browser. I haven't been able to find a fix for this yet, other than use a different browser.

Please let me know if you find any more bugs. There's bound to be some even though I spent weeks trying to locate and fix them all.
